{"id":1055891631,"question_id":3,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 1 week","timestamp":1695347889,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1055891631/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"43.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        if(s.length()<2){\n            return s.length();\n        }\n        int i, j, val, max = 1;\n        HashMap<Character, Integer> found = new HashMap<>();\n        for(i=0,j=0;i<s.length() && j<s.length();){\n            if(found.containsKey(s.charAt(j))){\n                val = found.get(s.charAt(j));\n                max = Math.max(max, j-i);\n                while(i<=val){\n                    found.remove(s.charAt(i));\n                    i++;\n                }\n                continue;\n            }\n            found.put(s.charAt(j), j);\n            j++;\n        }\n        return max>(j-i)?max:j-i;\n        // int i=0, j = 1, max = 0;\n        // int[] present = new int[256];\n        // Arrays.fill(present, -1);\n        // present[s.charAt(0)] = 0;\n        // for(;i<s.length() && j<s.length();){\n        //     while(j<s.length()){\n        //         if(present[s.charAt(j)]!=-1){\n        //             max = Math.max(j-i, max);\n        //             break;\n        //         }\n        //         present[s.charAt(j)]=j;\n        //         j++;\n        //     }\n        //     while(i<=present[(s.charAt(j) - 'a')]){\n        //         present[s.charAt(i)] = -1;\n        //         i++;\n        //     }\n        //     present[s.charAt(j)] = j;\n        //     j++;\n        // }\n        // return Math.max(max, j-i);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
